job.title: Software Engineer, Test
job.description: At Genesys, we’ve built the best cloud-based Customer Experience (CX) service offerings, which handles millions of interactions a day. Our infrastructure involves hundreds of services deployed across 9 environments globally, and we push out dozens of product builds per day using a top-notch CI/CD pipeline.<br><br>We are looking for a talented Software Engineer, Test to work with our Data Analytics team focusing on automated testing of big data processing and batch data actions.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Help develop new features for our platform service with quality built in. </li><li>Triage failed automated test executions and report defects when appropriate. </li><li>Participating in code reviews, direct collaboration, and open discussion of ongoing work. </li><li>Develop automation for new features and processes. </li><li>Assist development teams on testing best practices. </li><li>Determine whether to deploy new code to production regions. <br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>A Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or related degree or equivalent in work experience. </li><li>Proficiency using Java. </li><li>Previous experience using test frameworks like Selenium and TestNG. </li><li>Understanding of cloud computing, ideally AWS. <br></li></ul><strong><u>Nice To Have<br></u></strong><ul><li>Agile/Scrum experience. </li><li>Best practices for CI/CD. </li><li>Proficiency using Python. </li><li>Experience testing RESTful API’s </li><li>Experience with big data tools like Apache Spark. </li><li>Experience with Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR) </li><li>Experience using version control systems like GitHub and BitBucket. <br></li></ul><strong><u>Benefits<br></u></strong><ul><li>Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance </li><li>Telehealth coverage </li><li>Flexible work schedules and work from home opportunities </li><li>Development and career growth opportunities </li><li>Open Time Off </li><li>401(k) matching program </li><li>Adoption Assistance </li><li>Infertility treatments <br></li></ul>See more Genesys benefits information at https://mygenesysbenefits.com/
